instance_template: player(pusher). stone(s1..s2). location(c1..c10). is_goal(c5). is_goal(c6). adj(c1, c2, north). at(pusher, c1, 0). at(s1, c2, 0). clear(c3, 0). horizon(20).
generator:
{ move(P, From, To, Dir, T) : player(P), adj(From, To, Dir); push(P, S, PPos, SFrom, STo, Dir, T) : player(P), stone(S), adj(PPos, SFrom, Dir), adj(SFrom, STo, Dir) ; noop(T) } = 1 :- T = 1..H, horizon(H).

at(P, To, T) :- move(P, From, To, Dir, T).
at(P, SFrom, T) :- push(P, S, PPos, SFrom, STo, Dir, T).
at(S, STo, T) :- push(P, S, PPos, SFrom, STo, Dir, T).

at(Thing, Loc, T) :- at(Thing, Loc, T-1), not moved(Thing, T), T = 1..H, horizon(H).
moved(P, T) :- move(P, From, To, Dir, T).
moved(P, T) :- push(P, S, PPos, SFrom, STo, Dir, T).
moved(S, T) :- push(P, S, PPos, SFrom, STo, Dir, T).

clear(Loc, T) :- not occupied(Loc, T), location(Loc), T = 1..H, horizon(H).
occupied(Loc, T) :- at(Thing, Loc, T).

hard_constraints.description: Business Requirements: Policy dictates that a move action can only occur if the player is currently at the source location and the target location is clear of obstacles.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- move(P, From, To, Dir, T), not at(P, From, T-1).

hard_constraints.description: Business Requirements: Security protocols prohibit moving into a square that is already occupied by a stone or a wall.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- move(P, From, To, Dir, T), occupied(To, T-1).

hard_constraints.description: Business Requirements: Compliance rules for stone manipulation require the player to be adjacent to the stone and the path behind the stone to be clear.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- push(P, S, PPos, SFrom, STo, Dir, T), not at(P, PPos, T-1).

hard_constraints.description: Business Requirements: Strategic constraints require the stone being pushed to actually be present at the designated pivot point before the action is executed.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- push(P, S, PPos, SFrom, STo, Dir, T), not at(S, SFrom, T-1).

hard_constraints.description: Business Requirements: Operational safety prohibits pushing a stone into a location that is currently occupied by another object.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- push(P, S, PPos, SFrom, STo, Dir, T), occupied(STo, T-1).

hard_constraints.description: Business Requirements: Project completion status requires that every stone in the inventory must be positioned on a valid goal square at the final time step.
hard_constraints.asp_rule:
:- stone(S), horizon(H), not on_goal(S, H).
on_goal(S, T) :- at(S, L, T), is_goal(L).

soft_constraints.description: Business Requirements: To ensure operational efficiency, the system should minimize the total number of actions performed by the pusher.
soft_constraints.asp_rule:
penalty("step_cost", (T), 1) :- move(P, From, To, Dir, T).
penalty("step_cost", (T), 1) :- push(P, S, PP, SF, ST, Dir, T).
